Directions: In a bowl, combine the rice, water, tomatoes and bouillon; mix well. Pour into a greased 2-qt. microwave-safe dish. Cover and microwave on high for 10 minutes. Stir in the sour cream and 1/2 cup of cheese; mix well. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese. Cover and microwave for 1 minute or until cheese is melted.
Ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chilies, undrained
